text.section: The system of organization, armament, discipline and government of the National Guard shall be prescribed from time to time in a code of regulations promulgated by the Governor, subject to the laws and regulations of the United States.

The system of organization, armament, discipline and government of the Kentucky active militia shall be prescribed from time to time in a "Code of Regulations" to be promulgated by the adjutant general after being authorized by the Governor.

law.history: Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 127, sec. 10. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 4, secs. 10 and 24. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 2711a-145f, 2711a-157.
